# Accelerating Earth Observation Innovations

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4162560187 − Doc4170998199
**Publication Date:** August 31, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT

**Purpose:**

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) has released a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of goods and services to accelerate Earth Observation application innovations to address Canada's environmental and socioeconomic challenges.

**Scope of Work:**

The CSA requires the intelligent use of satellite data to develop innovative concept solutions (ICS) for several environmental and socioeconomic challenges of current importance to Canada. The scope of work is described in the Statement of Work (SOW) in Annex A: Stage 1 - Concept Definition.

**Requirements:**

• All stage 1 deliverables must be received no later than 11 weeks from the contract date.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The tender evaluation will be based on highest technical merit within a stipulated maximum budget.

**Procedures:**

Please follow the tender notice in SAP Ariba:  https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17321461

**Amendment to Closing Time:**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Agency Information:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada

For more information, please contact Joey Pasqua (joey.pasqua@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

# Instructions to Bidders
To submit a bid, please follow the processes outlined in the SAP Ariba platform. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by the closing date and time.

**Closing Time:** October 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT

**Note:** Amended closing time please adhere to the specified closing time.
